text: Happy New Year! Hope you had a good Christmas, we're all back today. So to answer your previous question! Yeah loads of people pitch ideas for the shorts but the process has been different each time, sometimes it's pitching in person in front of the studio, others have been private, like the last few. And yeah it completely feels like a Uni project, I haven't worked on one since More Stuff bit that was great everyone mucking in together, i had to do a lot of work with deformers because we didn't have the time to rig the characters to deform how we wanted for this one shot!
I wouldn't say we get time within work hours to learn new stuff, not unless it's relevent to the show you're on, not officially anyway but we have a good culture of sharing ideas and techniques.
